title: Chat restriction
body: Hello, I just got chat restricted last night. Am I still going to get my border and rewards going to be still there when season 9 starts? Or am I just done for?

replies.body:
Aren't borders and stuff already distributed?
chat restriction only bump you down a little.
be nice for a couple of weeks.

and you will get your stuff :)

u will get everything because honor will reset at january 23 next year.
u will get everything dont worry

> [{quoted}](name=ı Sona ı,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1zR3BbJ4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-23T04:23:44.052+0000)
>
> If you get your honor up to par and don't get any more punishments forever, maybe. 
> 
> Be nice in chat from now on. 
> 
> {{sticker:sona-playing}}

I just want to know the penalties I'm going to be getting for that. Honestly, it was my first game to swear at someone in about 500 games, it feels unfair but it is what it is. I'm just trying to figure out what I'll be dealing with now.

> [{quoted}](name=Lûca,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1zR3BbJ4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-23T04:26:42.192+0000)
>
> I just want to know the penalties I'm going to be getting for that. Honestly, it was my first game to swear at someone in about 500 games, it feels unfair but it is what it is. I'm just trying to figure out what I'll be dealing with now.

I hold to what I said in my previous post.
